articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Remodeled Mangyongdae Children's Camp
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Remodeled Mangyongdae Children's Camp
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the construction site of the Ryongaksan Soap Factory.
					 After being briefed on the construction in front of the map showing a panoramic view of the factory, he went round the construction site and indicated tasks and ways for building the soap factory at the best level.
					
					 He recalled that leader Kim Jong Il in his life time gave an instruction for building a factory producing liquid soap. The factory which will produce shampoo, bath-soap, powder soap, etc. is the factory directly related to improving the standard of people's living to which the party attaches importance, he noted.
					
					 He stressed the need to perfectly equip the factory with modern facilities, highly automate all the production processes including raw material feeding, mixing, injection, packing and forwarding, establish an integral control system at the top level and sufficiently install there latest analyzing equipment to strictly verify and guarantee the hygienic safety of products.
					
					 He gave instructions to accelerate the technical preparations for mass-producing varieties of soap with locally available raw materials and perfumery and work out a plan on the design and packing of products in such a way as to be convenient to the customers.
					
					 He named the factory "Ryongaksan Soap Factory", saying that the party chose the site for the factory at the foot of picturesque Mt. Ryongak with clean water and air as the production of quality cosmetics requires clean environment.
					
					 He emphasized that the party is waiting for the completion of the construction of the factory as it is urgently required by the people.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials of the relevant field and soldier builders would perform new miracles and feats as befitting honorable participants in the 200-day campaign and fighters in the charge for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK and thus successfully build the factory to be proud of in the world by Oct. 10, the founding anniversary of the party.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the NDC.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK National Coordination Committee for AML/CFT Blasts U.S. Illegal Action against DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK National Coordination Committee for AML/CFT Blasts U.S. Illegal Action against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- On June 1, the U.S. Department of Treasury announced that it would officially designate the DPRK as the jurisdiction of "primary money laundering concern" and work out regulations of the special measures to tighten the isolation of the DPRK under the international financial system.
					 A spokesman for the DPRK National Coordination Committee for AML/CFT (anti-money laundering and countering financing of terrorism) on Saturday released a statement vehemently denouncing the above-said action as another illegal act of infringing upon the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK. 
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Through the above-said action the U.S. pursues the sinister aim of making up the flaw of the UN "resolution on sanctions" with its independent and additional sanctions in blatant violation of the UN Charter and international law and totally blockading the DPRK after finding it hard to achieve its objective through the unreasonable UN "resolution on sanctions."
					
					 The U.S. is loudly calling on the neighboring countries to increase pressure upon the DPRK while vociferating about the "implementation of the sanctions", but the DPRK dismisses this as a nonsensical talk.
					
					 The DPRK is not frightened in the least by the U.S. stereotyped method of labeling it "money launderer", not content with branding it as "a nuclear proliferators", "human rights abuser," etc. 
					
					 The world should be well aware of these despicable moves of the U.S. and remain vigilant against them as it is staging such ridiculous farce quite contrary to the fact that the DPRK is having good cooperation with the Financial Action Task Force in the field of AML/CFT.
					
					 Proceeding from its consistent stand of opposing money laundering and combating financing of terrorism, the DPRK set up such a well-regulated state system as establishing the Financial Supervisory Bureau and the Financial Information Bureau to prevent money laundering as required by international standard and adopted the AML/CFT Law. It has closely cooperated with the international organization since it acceded to the International Convention for the Suppression of the Financing of Terrorism.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can attain its sinister political goal through the above-said action.
					
					 With no desperate actions can the U.S. prevent the DPRK from building a socialist power by dint of its tremendous military muscle and in the indomitable spirit of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Equatorial Guinean President
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, on his 74th birthday.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing good friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Equatorial Guinea would grow stronger, the message wholeheartedly wished the president good health and happiness and bigger success in his responsible work for the country's development and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Swedish King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Swedish King
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Carl ⅩⅥ Gustaf, king of Sweden, on its national day.
					 The message wished the king good health and happiness and success in his work for the prosperity of Sweden.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Marked
 Samjiyon, June 4 (KCNA) -- There took place a national meeting in front of the statue of President Kim Il Sung in the Samjiyon Grand Monument on Saturday to mark the 60th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 Attending it were Pak Pong Ju, Pak Yong Sik, Choe Pu Il and Vice-Premier Kim Tok Hun, Kim Jong Im, director of the Party History Institute of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK),
					
					officials of the party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials who set examples in sprucing up, preserving and managing the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu and carrying out their revolutionary tasks, persons of meritorious services, commanding officers and members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade and the Construction Shock Brigade 618, officials and working people in Ryanggang Province, members of the groups for the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu and youth and students.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and prime minister of the Cabinet, made a report.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il started the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu while leading the first group for the study tour in June, Juche 45 (1956). This was a historic event of great significance for carrying out the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The start of the study tour during the days of ordeals of the Korean revolution was a bold decision which could be made only by Kim Jong Il who regarded it as his lifetime mission to carry out the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung to the end.
					
					 The whole course of the study tour is associated with Kim Jong Il's firm faith and will to carry on the march started from Mt. Paektu forever.
					
					 The study tour provided an immortal landmark for carrying forward the revolutionary traditions of the WPK through generations, building the DPRK as the invincible power full of the spirit of Paektu and displaying its might before the whole world.
					
					 The glorious revolutionary traditions of the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung and firmly maintained by Kim Jong Il are being successfully carried forward and developed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the road of advance in the new century of Juche.

articles.title: Delegation of WPK Leaves for Vietnam, Laos
articles.content:
Delegation of WPK Leaves for Vietnam, Laos
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice chairman of its Central Committee, left here on Saturday to visit the Socialist Republic of Vietnam and the Lao People's Democratic Republic.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Leave
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Leave 
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Tae Sik, vice-chairman of the Korean Medical Association in Japan, and a delegation of Korean medical persons in the U.S. led by Park Kee Bum left here on Saturday after participating in the 18th Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science of Koreans at Home and Abroad.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Delegates to KCU
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Delegates to KCU
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials Saturday visited the lodging quarters of the delegates to the events for marking the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and the youth league visited the lodging quarters of the delegates.
					
					 They warmly congratulated the delegates.
					
					 They called upon schoolchildren to firmly prepare themselves to be the successors who would shoulder upon the future of the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegates to Celebrations of 70th Anniversary of KCU Tour Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of 70th Anniversary of KCU Tour Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The delegates to the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid wreaths and bunches of flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 They looked round the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum. They deeply learned about the revolutionary lives and exploits of the President's family members while going round the historical relics preserved at his old home.
					
					 They visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk before paying tribute to her.
					
					 They also went to the Youth Movement Museum.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il finding themselves among youths and children in the general hall of the museum and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the photos of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and historical materials and relics on display.
					
					 They also toured the Sci-Tech Complex.

articles.title: German Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
German Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany headed by Chairman Michael Koth visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae, the guests went round the historical relics preserved at the old home.
					
					 They went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Monument to Party Founding, Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery, the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification, etc.

articles.title: National Children's Football Games Close
articles.content:
National Children's Football Games Close
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The 3rd national children's football games closed.
					 There were men's and women's finals on the playground of the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Saturday.
					
					 The men's and women's teams of Pyongyang took the first place.
					
					 The finals were followed by a closing ceremony
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, players and campers.

articles.title: Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Draw Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Draw Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Over 71,825,000 service personnel, working people and school youth and children of more than 74,400 units have toured the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu for the last six decades.
					 Service personnel demonstrating the might and spirit of the powerful revolutionary army at posts for defending the country and sites for building an economic power made tours of the sacred place of the revolution.
					
					 Marching from the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site to Mt. Paektu, they deeply grasped the revolutionary idea and Juche-oriented war methods of President Kim Il Sung and kept the indomitable revolutionary spirit of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in their mind as textbook and pabulum of their life and struggle.
					
					 The number of visitors to the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu has increased year by year among working people and school youth and children. 
					
					 They felt a great pride and honor of having been blessed with the illustrious leaders when they visited Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 They went round the log cabin of the headquarters in which the President stayed and historical relics associated with the anti-Japanese war including trees bearing slogans written by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Over 1.1 million people have toured the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu since Marshal Kim Jong Un looked round the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site in November, 2013.

articles.title: Expedition to Mt. Paektu Goes on in DPRK
articles.content:
Expedition to Mt. Paektu Goes on in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Expedition to Mt. Paektu by servicepersons, schoolchildren and other people is now going on in the DPRK.
					 Touring the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu, they learn after the revolutionary spirit displayed by members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), who carried on the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The expedition to the mountain was pioneered by leader Kim Jong Il 60 years ago.
					
					 On June 5, Juche 45 (1956), he launched the historic study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu, together with students of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1.
					
					 During the tour, he made the students deeply study the feats Kim Il Sung performed in leading the anti-Japanese war to victory and follow the indomitable revolutionary spirit and way of life of the KPRA members.
					
					 Since then, the revolutionary traditions of the Workers' Party of Korea have been invariably carried forward.
					
					 In the whole period of his leadership over the Korean revolution, Kim Jong Il regarded it as a fundamental matter decisive of the destiny of the party and the revolution to creditably carry forward the revolutionary traditions of Juche.
					
					 Under his wise guidance, a work was conducted to collect and systematize on a full scale the materials related to the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and revolutionary sites and museums were restored and built throughout the country.
					
					 And a system was established to ensure the tour of those revolutionary sites including the revolutionary battle sites in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The revolutionary tradition of the WPK is creditably carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 When he climbed the top of Mt. Paektu in April, 2015, he said that climbing Mt. Paektu provides precious mental pabulum more powerful than any kind of nuclear weapon and it is the way for carrying forward the revolutionary tradition of Paektu and giving steady continuity to the glorious Korean revolution.
					
					 Songs "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu" and "Let's Not Abandon Revolutionary Faith Though One May Die" sweeps across the country and zeal for visiting revolutionary sites runs ever higher.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the Korean people to invariably carry forward the tradition of Mt. Paektu, led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Jik and Idea of "Aim High"
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Jik and Idea of "Aim High"
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- 90 years has passed since the demise of indomitable revolutionary fighter Kim Hyong Jik (June 5, 1926).
					 On this occasion, the DPRK people are recalling the revolutionary life of Kim Hyong Jik who set forth the idea of "Aim High" and dedicated his all to the independence of the country and emancipation of the proletarian people.
					
					 "Aim High" is an idea calling for liberating the country by fighting through generations.
					
					 With this idea, he groped for a way to liberate the country and formed the Korean National Association, an anti-Japanese underground revolutionary organization.
					
					 He even got his idea more hardened though he was subjected to bloody tortures after being arrested by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 After the release from prison, he composed a poem "The Green Pine-tree on Nam Hill", which represents his resolve to achieve the independence of the country at any cost by fighting through generations.
					
					 He demonstrated the inevitability of the proletarian revolution and advanced a policy of shifting the anti-Japanese national liberation movement from nationalist movement to proletarian revolution.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, keeping the idea of "Aim High" deep in his mind, led the anti-Japanese war and the anti-U.S. war to victory and built a socialist country centered on the masses.
					
					 Now, the idea of "Aim High" is creditably carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who energetically leads the drive for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides Japan as Pitiful Henchman
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides Japan as Pitiful Henchman
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Utterly deplorable are the relations between the master U.S. and servant Japan.
					 An incident happened in Okinawa Prefecture, Japan recently in which a civilian worker of the U.S. forces in Japan raped and murdered a Japanese woman and dumped her body but he did not feel guilty even a bit.
					
					 In the prefecture where there are tens of hundreds of U.S. forces, even civilian employees, to say nothing of GIs, do not feel even regretful after molesting Japanese women and committing sexual assaults against them.
					
					 Irony is that the Japanese foreign minister told rubbish in a lecture the U.S. which has acted a world gendarme is "gradually becoming timid." His ridiculous remarks came at a time when the Japanese public resentment at the U.S. forces in Japan was running high. 
					
					 This is rubbish spouted by a poor servant who has to help his master button up his pants and please him even though he rapes and murders a number of Japanese women.
					
					 So poor is Japan as it has to cozy up to the U.S. without making even a word of protest even though its land is trampled down by the U.S. forces and its women are teased in its eyes.
					
					 Despite much-touted "alliance" the relations between the U.S. and Japan are nothing but those between the master and his servant.
					
					 During his recent junket to Japan Obama expressed just outward regret over the murder of the Japanese woman. He did not make an apology for it and even declined the request made by the governor of Okinawa Prefecture for meeting.
					
					 Like master, like man. Even the U.S. soldiers and their civilian employees seem to regard Japanese men including politicians as imbeciles of a colony unable to protect their own women.
					
					 The de factor ruler of Okinawa Prefecture under the military occupation of the U.S. is Americans, not Japanese.
					
					 Davis, the spokesman for the U.S. Defence Department, concerning the request made by the Okinawa Prefectural governor on revising the status of forces agreement between Japan and the U.S. in the wake of the occurrence of the recent case, openly expressed a stand not to respond to it, saying that the U.S. forces have approached Japanese side's concerns with improvement, not with revision, and they will continue to approach it the same way.
					
					 Even though its citizens including women are being exposed to insult and meeting death, not sleeping comfortable sleep due to the U.S. forces' crimes, Japan fails to make even a single shout at the U.S.
					
					 It is just the Japanese citizens who are suffering due to the senseless politicians who serve the U.S. and fail to make even proper words.
					
					 Shortly ago, Prime Minister Abe "invited" the American boss to Hiroshima, the land of distress where approximately 260 000 innocent people lost their lives due to the A-bomb dropped by the U.S. for the first time in human history, and kowtowed to him.
					
					 Even the Japanese ambassador to the U.S. went so stupid as saying he would not like to say anything of Obama who did not apologize for the A-bomb dropping.
					
					 Japan looks so miserable that it has to eat boiled crow even though its life security is seriously threatened.
					
					 Japan is fated to continue to please his American master with its underwear down.

articles.title: U.S. Era Ends: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Era Ends: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Book "Failed Duty" criticizing the foreign policy of the U.S. authorities is drawing attention of readers in the U.S.
					 The author of the book in a book "U.S. Doom" in 2011, analyzing and reviewing the U.S. act after the end of the Cold War, said that the U.S. tried to force other countries to accept its political system palatable to its taste but ended in failure, which resulted in total bankruptcy of the foreign policy of the U.S. administration and, therefore, the U.S. should abandon its ambition to dominate the world in the future.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this a correct estimation fully reflecting the current plight of the U.S.
					
					 The status of the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" in the world has already declined, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The history of the U.S. is one of evils and evil runs through its foreign policy.
					
					 The U.S. which rose up on bloody compost of Indians regarded the use of strength as its state policy and has resorted to aggression, war and interference into internal affairs of other countries, meeting its avaricious interests through them.
					
					 The U.S., obsessed with strength-almighty conception, has expanded its overseas military bases and resorted to modernization of arms and equipment and arms buildup for aggression and plunder while squandering a fabulous amount for military spending.
					
					 The U.S. bragged that the security of its mainland had never been threatened but it is a cock-and-bull story now when various countries have developed cutting-edge strike weapons.
					
					 The American Empire at present is more dead than alive as it is sentenced to death by the world.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. boasted of "might" and the era of the "only superpower" in the world is ending.
					
					 What awaits the U.S. now is the final doom. This is inevitable.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Drop Conception of Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Drop Conception of Confrontation
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities should boldly drop traitorous conception of confrontation and respect the fellow countrymen and take a courageous decision to join hands as fellow travelers for reunification, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article.
					 If the south Korean authorities persist in their own assertion under the unreasonable preconditions in disregard of the interests of the nation, big obstacles hard to tide over will be laid in the way of improving the north-south relations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should neither hope for "change" of the north nor seek "unification of social systems" but sincerely take the stand for national concord and reunification.
					
					 It is beyond doubt that the inter-Korean relations will radically improve and main problems in achieving national reunification and co-prosperity will be solved if the south Korean authorities drop the old conception of confrontation in a bold way and sincerely opt for the way of improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to fundamentally improve the inter-Korean relations and open up a wide avenue to independent reunification through dialogue and negotiations, not by confrontation and war.
					
					 However, if the south Korean authorities persist in the racket to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, going against the trend of the times, the DPRK will not tolerate them in the least but take resolute counteraction.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should face up to the trend of the times and aspiration of the fellow countrymen, drop conception of confrontation which is nothing helpful to improving the inter-Korean relations and the nation and respond to the proposal made by the DPRK out of patriotism.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slashes at Authorities' Moves to Set up "Foundation"
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slashes at Authorities' Moves to Set up "Foundation"
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1 233rd Wednesday meeting before the Japanese embassy in Seoul on June 1 to denounce the puppet regime for its moves to install a "foundation" insulting the victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 At the meeting Kim Pok Dong, victim of sexual slavery, accused the Park Geun Hye regime of establishing a preparatory committee for inaugurating the "foundation" on May 31, as a follow-up to the "agreement" on sexual slavery it made with Japan.
					
					 Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the Council, deplored that the authorities are working hard to cover up Japan's crimes for one billion yen though it refuses to repent of and make apology and reparation for the sexual slavery.
					
					 A statement read out at the meeting urged the Japanese government to admit the crimes related to sexual slavery and make apology and legal reparation without fail.
					
					 It rejected the establishment of the "foundation."

articles.title: Earthquake Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3.0 on the Richter scale jolted North Kyongsang Province of south Korea on Friday, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 Its epicenter was 22 kilometers west of Sangju City.

articles.title: Wage Increase Demanded by S. Korean Workers
articles.content:
Wage Increase Demanded by S. Korean Workers
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a meeting in demand of wage increase before the building of the puppet Ministry of Employment and Labor on June 2, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 The organization said that the minimum wage committee held a meeting to decide the minimum wage in 2017 that day.
					
					 In case the plutocrats reassert minimum wage freeze under a groundless pretext, they will meet strong resistance, it warned
					
					 It said that it would struggle for wage hike till the minimum wage is finally decided. 
					
					 In another development, that day the KCTU declared it would stage intensive actions for wage hike in 13 areas of south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Conniving at U.S. Moves for Biochemical Warfare
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Conniving at U.S. Moves for Biochemical Warfare
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Pusan People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea staged a demonstration at the square of the Pusan City Office on May 31 in protest against the authorities' connivance at the U.S. forces' moves for biochemical warfare, according to the south Korean internet paper O My News.
					 On May 27 the puppet Defense Ministry, referring to the U.S. forces' choice of the dock No. 8 of Pusan Port as the first site for carrying out their Jupiter Plan, claimed that they decided on it because "it is of strategic importance as a military port and it is close to the densely populated area."
					
					 The Pusan City Office also allowed the plan of the U.S. forces to install a lab for biochemical warfare in Pusan, asserting that it "had no intention to oppose the policy pursued by the government despite citizens' opposition and it respects the stand of the Defense Ministry."
					
					 Infuriated by this, the representative of the Pusan People for Achieving Peace and Reunification denounced the U.S. aggressor forces' dangerous moves for biochemical warfare and the puppet regime for backing them.

articles.title: Political Parties, Bodies of Russia, Commonwealth of Independent States Celebrate Successful 7th Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Political Parties, Bodies of Russia, Commonwealth of Independent States Celebrate Successful 7th Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- There took place a joint seminar of political parties and o organizations of Russia and the Commonwealth of Independent States for celebrating the successful Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in Moscow on May 30 under the sponsorship of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					 Present at the seminar were representatives and other personages of more than 30 political parties and bodies of nine countries. They included the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, Ukrainian Communist Party, Estonian Communist Party, People's Communist Party of Kazakhstan, Communist Party of Kyrgyzstan, Communist Party of Georgia, Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and the International Officers Union of the Soviet Union.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials.
					
					 Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, first vice-chairman of the Central Council of the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and first vice-chairman of the Committee for Commonwealth of Independent States Affairs, Eurasia Integration and Liaison with Compatriots of the State Duma, made an opening address which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the Seventh Congress of the WPK was an event of great political significance not only for the Korean people but also for the world socialist movement and the joint seminar would be an important occasion for learning from the experience of the WPK and defending the socialist cause.
					
					 The Russia-DPRK relations are the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with long historical roots and the Communist Party of the Russian Federation will make positive efforts to preserve the tradition of friendship and cooperation, they said.
					
					 A message of greeting to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted and a joint statement supporting the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK was made public at the joint seminar.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the Korean people would implement the decision of the congress and achieve fresh successes in building a prosperous power under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and the invincible fraternal friendship among the peoples of different countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Participants of Joint Seminar
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Participants of Joint Seminar
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a message from those who attended a joint seminar of the political parties and organizations of Russia and the Commonwealth of Independent States for celebrating the successful Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on May 30.
					 The message sent congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon the successful WPK Seventh Congress and his election as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the Korean people will carry out all the tasks advanced at the party congress under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the message said:
					
					 The WPK set forth the internal and external policy strategy guided by the great revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to ensure security and prosperity for the Korean people in face of the international pressure by the imperialist forces.
					
					 The WPK has pursued the Songun politics while adhering to this strategy and thus become a powerful political force leading the Korean people to performing epochal creation.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un great success in his future work and steady contribution to the cause of implementing the ideas of socialism, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Opening Address of Kim Jong Un at Seventh Congress of WPK Posted by South African Organization on Website
articles.content:
Opening Address of Kim Jong Un at Seventh Congress of WPK Posted by South African Organization on Website
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- An opening address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was posted with his photo by the South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on May 19.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support DPRK's Building of Nuclear Force
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support DPRK's Building of Nuclear Force
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on May 29 released a joint statement denouncing Obama for talking rubbish about the DPRK's righteous building of nuclear force.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Obama slandered the DPRK at the G-7 Summit held in Japan.
					
					 His vitriol arouses great indignation and doesn't hold any water.
					
					 The DPRK is sincerely implementing its commitment to nuclear non-proliferation as a responsible nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The U.S. is the very one that just bars the world from being free from nuclear weapons.
					
					 If the U.S. really wants to rid the world of nuclear weapons, it should abandon its nuclear weapons first and stop the nuclear threat and blackmail to other countries and nations.
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness that Obama, president of the only country that used nuclear weapons, talked about denuclearization in the place over which the U.S. dropped A-bombs.
					
					 Obama's plan for building the "world without nuclear weapons" is nothing but a whopping lie.
					
					 As long as the imperialists continue posing nuclear threat and resorting to arbitrary practices, the DPRK will bolster up its nuclear force both in quality and quantity.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear force.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Campamento de Ninos de Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Campamento de Ninos de Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Campamento de Ninos de Mangyongdae nuevamente reconstruido.
					El Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, la sala de conservacion de objetos historicos revolucionarios y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Al ver solo el Campamento de Ninos de Mangyongdae, puede saber bien el gran amor y abnegacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il para formar a los ninos como dignos trabajadores del pais con ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud, enfatizo.
					
					Continuo que el trabajo para acondicionar bien los campamentos, casas y palacios de ninos de todo el pais conforme a la demanda de nuevo siglo es importante para realizar en la practica el noble espiritu del Presidente y el Dirigente y subrayo que deben glorificar las hazanas de los grandes Lideres al impulsar consecuentemente este trabajo.
					
					Recorriendo varios lugares del campamento, el Mariscal estudio en detalles el estado de reconstruccion y de preparacion administrativa.
					
					En los dormitorios del campamento levantado en forma de torre, evaluo que se acondicionaron perfectamente para asegurar la satisfactoria comodidad de vida de los campistas.
					
					Recorriendo el lugar de juego folklorico, la biblioteca, la casa y otros lugares, alabo reiteradamente que reconstruyeron con firme decision para ofrecer a los ninos la mejor condicion de vida.
					
					Estuvo en los comedores del restaurante levantado lindamente sobre el lago donde dijo que lo construyeron particularmente para que los ninos tengan sensacion de comer en el barco y expreso su alegria diciendo que acondicionaron bien la sala de practica culinaria para que los ninos puedan cocinar con sus manos.
					
					Tras averiguar la calidad de agua de la piscina al aire libre y verificar la altura de la torre de saltos, el Mariscal dijo que hara instalar el tobogan apropiado al paisaje natural del contorno y que entonces los ninos no tendran ganas de salir de la piscina.
					
					Hara techar la acera desde el campamento hasta el restaurante y el campo de baloncesto para que los campistas no sientan la incomodidad aunque llueva, asevero y continuo que enviara al establo los animales raros y al lugar para paseos en botes, varios equipos favoritos de los ninos.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que recorrio el campamento con gran placer y expreso gran satisfaccion de que se levanto otro nuevo palacio de ninos donde esta impregnado el noble amor del Partido a las generaciones venideras.
					
					Ordeno que los comites del PTC en todas las provincias deben seguir el modo de trabajar del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang que asimilo con sensibilidad la politica del partido y despliega con dinamismo la lucha por su materializacion.
					
					El Mariscal exhorto a efectuar con solemnidad la ceremonia de inauguracion del campamento con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea para hacer resonar mas las risas y canciones de felicidad de los ninos.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, Jo Yong Won, subjefe de Departamento del CC del PTC y Ma Won Chun, director del Departamento de Diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el campo de construccion de la Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan que se construye nuevamente.
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano panoramico, el Mariscal recorrio el campo de la obra y presento las tareas y remedios para construirla en el mas alto nivel.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dio en su vida la instruccion sobre la construccion de la fabrica especializada de jabon liquido, recordo y continuo que esta fabrica, que produce champu, jabones liquido y en polvo y otros necesarios mucho entre los habitantes, esta relacionada directamente con la mejora de vida del pueblo y apreciada por el Partido.
					
					Asevero que la fabrica debe disponer plenamente de modernos equipos, automatizar en alto nivel todos los procesos productivos inclusive la introduccion de materias primas, la mixtura, la inyeccion, el embalaje y la expedicion, establecer en grado maximo el sistema de control combinado e  instalar suficientemente los equipos de analisis sofisticado para inspeccionar y garantizar estrictamente la seguridad higienica de los articulos.
					
					E instruyo que es necesario acelerar los preparativos tecnicos para producir varios jabones en abundancia con materias primas y perfumes criollos y calcular minuciosamente el diseno y embalaje de las mercancias para ofrecer la comodidad a los compradores.
					
					Senalo que para producir cosmeticos de buena calidad, debe ser limpio el ambiente de alrededores, razon por la cual el Partido fijo el solar de la fabrica al pie del pintoresco monte Ryongak y la denomino como Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que la Fabrica de Jabones Ryongaksan es necesaria apremiantemente para nuestro pueblo y que el Partido espera su inauguracion y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios de la rama correspondiente y los constructores militares levantaran magnificamente la fabrica hasta el 10 de octubre, dia de la fundacion del PTC, al hacer nuevos prodigios y meritos como honrosos combatientes y participantes en la campana de 200 dias por la materializacion de la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So y Choe Ryong Hae, miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, Jo Yong Won, subjefe de Departamento del CC del PTC y Ma Won Chun, director del Departamento de Diseno del CDN.

articles.title: RPDC condena maniobras de EE.UU. para aislarla y bloquearla
articles.content:
RPDC condena maniobras de EE.UU. para aislarla y bloquearla
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- El pasado dia primero, el Departamento de Finanzas de EE.UU. publico que designara oficialmente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "jurisdiccion de principal preocupacion de lavado de dinero" y elaborara los reglamentos de medidas especiales para aislarla mas en el sistema financiero internacional.
					El portavoz del Comite Nacional de Coordinacion de la RPDC sobre el Anti-lavado de Dinero y Anti-Financiacion del Terrorismo, en una declaracion fechada 4, condeno y rechazo categoricamente la conducta de EE.UU. calificandola como otro crimen ilegal que viola la soberania y el derecho a  subsistencia de la RPDC y continuo:
					
					La dicha designacion por EE.UU., fracasado en lograr su objetivo mediante la injusta "resolucion de sanciones" de la ONU, persigue el astuto proposito de fabricar sanciones por separado y adicionales violando cruelmente la Carta de la ONU y la ley internacional para remediar el defecto de la "resolucion de sanciones" de la ONU y realizar el bloqueo total contra la RPDC.
					
					El imperio demanda a los paises vecinos de la RPDC a ejercer mas la presion sobre esta, gritando la "ejecucion de sanciones", pero no hacemos caso de esta tonteria.
					
					Tampoco es sorprendente el metodo habitual de EE.UU. que intenta tildarnos de "pais de proliferacion nuclear", "pais violador de DDHH" e incluso "pais de lavado de dinero".
					
					El mundo debe conocer bien y tratar con vigilancia las viles maniobras de EE.UU., opuestas al hecho de que la RPDC y la Fuerza Encargada de Accion Financiera se colaboran bien en el sector de prevencion del lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo.
					
					Partiendo de la posicion consecuente contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo, la RPDC establecio el ordenado sistema estatal organizando la Direccion de Control Financiero y la Direccion de Informacion Financiera para prevencion del lavado de dinero conforme a la regla internacional, aprobo la ley contra el lavado del dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo y sigue colaborando con la organizacion internacional ingresando a la Convencion Internacional sobre la Supresion de la Financiacion del Terrorismo.
					
					Es una gran equivocacion si EE.UU. piensa en que pueda lograr su malsano proposito politico mediante la designacion a la RPDC como "jurisdiccion de principal preocupacion de lavado de dinero".
					
					Por mucho que se desespere, EE.UU. nunca podra impedir el avance de la RPDC que construye la potencia socialista con el inquebrantable poderio militar y el espiritu indoblegable de autofortalecimiento.

articles.title: Acto central por el dia de inicio de recorrido por lugares de batallas por Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por el dia de inicio de recorrido por lugares de batallas por Kim Jong Il
Samjiyon, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 el acto central dedicado al aniversario 60 del inicio del recorrido por los lugares de batallas revolucionarias de la zona del monte Paektu emprendido por la iniciativa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el patio de educacion frente a la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, erguida en el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon.
					En el acto estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, Pak Yong Sik, Choe Pu Il, el vicepremier Kim Tok Hun, la directora del Instituto de Historia del Partido del CC de PTC, Kim Jong Im, los funcionarios de los organos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios y benemeritos ejemplares en la conservacion y la administracion del lugar de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu y en el cumplimiento de la tarea revolucionaria, los comandantes y miembros de la Brigada de Construccion 618 y la Brigada Heroes Jovenes Paektusan, los funcionarios y trabajadores de la provincia de Ryanggang, los integrantes de la caravana y los estudiantes jovenes.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					Pak dijo que en junio del 45 (1956) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dio inicio al recorrido por los lugares de batallas revolucionarias de la zona del monte Paektu conduciendo la primera caravana, lo cual fue un acontecimiento historico que tiene gran significacion en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Apunto que este evento efectuado en el periodo cuando se creaban las severas dificultades ante la revolucion coreana, fue logrado solo por el Dirigente quien considero como su mision de vida el trabajo de llevar a feliz termino la idea y causa del Presidente.
					
					En la ruta caminada por el Dirigente estan grabadas la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de el de continuar invariablemente la marcha del Paektu, asevero.
					
					Desde entonces, fue preparado el jalon eterno que permite continuar de generacion en generacion las tradiciones revolucionarias del PTC, convertir la RPDC en una potencia en que reina el impetu del Paektu y ostentar a todo el mundo su gallardo aspecto.
					
					Concluyo que las orgullosas tradiciones revolucionarias del PTC creadas por el Presidente y defendidas por el Dirigente, se heredan con exito por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en la marcha de la nueva centuria del Juche.

articles.title: Parte hacia Vietnam y Laos delegacion de PTC
articles.content:
Parte hacia Vietnam y Laos delegacion de PTC 
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezada por Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, partio el dia 4 de esta capital para visitar la Republica Socialista de Vietnam y la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
